statements: SELECT * FROM SupplierCompliance;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM SupplierCompliance WHERE sustainability_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM SupplierCompliance WHERE last_audit_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, sustainability_score FROM SupplierCompliance ORDER BY sustainability_score DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, last_audit_date FROM SupplierCompliance WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM SupplierCompliance WHERE sustainability_score > 80;
SELECT supplier_name, last_audit_date FROM SupplierCompliance ORDER BY last_audit_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM SupplierCompliance WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT supplier_name, sustainability_score FROM SupplierCompliance WHERE sustainability_score < 50 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(sustainability_score) AS highest_score, MIN(sustainability_score) AS lowest_score FROM SupplierCompliance;
SELECT * FROM supplier_data;
SELECT supplier_name, sustainability_score FROM supplier_data ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, last_audit_date FROM supplier_data WHERE sustainability_score > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM supplier_audit WHERE audit_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, audit_date, audit_result FROM supplier_data INNER JOIN supplier_audit ON supplier_data.supplier_id = supplier_audit.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, sustainability_score, last_audit_date FROM supplier_data WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, last_audit_date FROM supplier_data WHERE sustainability_score > 4.0 ORDER BY last_audit_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, sustainability_score, last_audit_date FROM supplier_data WHERE last_audit_date >= '2023-01-01' AND sustainability_score < 3.5;

SELECT * FROM supplier_data INNER JOIN supplier_audit ON supplier_data.supplier_id = supplier_audit.supplier_id WHERE supplier_data.supplier_name LIKE '%Corp%' ORDER BY supplier_audit.audit_date DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, sustainability_score, audit_date, audit_result FROM supplier_data LEFT JOIN supplier_audit ON supplier_data.supplier_id = supplier_audit.supplier_id WHERE supplier_data.sustainability_score IS NULL OR supplier_audit.audit_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, sustainability_rating FROM Suppliers WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM Products INNER JOIN Suppliers ON Products.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM Products GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT data_id, sustainability_metric, sustainability_value FROM SustainabilityData WHERE sustainability_value >= 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, sustainability_rating FROM Suppliers WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT supplier_name, sustainability_rating FROM Suppliers WHERE sustainability_rating > 3 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT Suppliers.supplier_name, Products.product_name FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id WHERE Suppliers.sustainability_rating >= 4;

SELECT supplier_name, sustainability_metric, sustainability_value FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN SustainabilityData ON Suppliers.supplier_id = SustainabilityData.supplier_id WHERE SustainabilityData.sustainability_value > 0.8 ORDER BY sustainability_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_compliance;
SELECT id, name, location FROM supplier_compliance;
SELECT * FROM supplier_sustainability_data WHERE energy_consumption > 1000;
SELECT supplier_id, year, water_usage FROM supplier_sustainability_data WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT standard_name, requirement FROM sustainability_standards;
SELECT * FROM supplier_compliance WHERE sustainability_score > 80;
SELECT name, location FROM supplier_compliance ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT sc.name, sc.location, ssd.year, ssd.energy_consumption FROM supplier_compliance sc JOIN supplier_sustainability_data ssd ON sc.id = ssd.supplier_id WHERE ssd.energy_consumption > 500;
SELECT sch.supplier_id, sch.compliance_status, ss.standard_name FROM supplier_compliance_history sch JOIN sustainability_standards ss ON sch.compliance_status = ss.id;
SELECT * FROM supplier_sustainability_data WHERE year = 2022 AND energy_consumption < 1000 ORDER BY water_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_compliance;
SELECT supplier_name, compliance_status FROM supplier_compliance;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM product_inventory;
SELECT supplier_name, location_name FROM supplier_locations;
SELECT metric_name, metric_description FROM sustainability_metrics;
SELECT supplier_name, sustainability_rating FROM supplier_compliance;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_description FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE metric_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, compliance_status FROM supplier_compliance WHERE supplier_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 50;
